review: What was life before the invention of the Firestick....BORING!  We love it.
author: JCSMiller

review: Can't say enough good about this!
author: Alice Morgan

review: It has a lot of neat features. I like the ability to see photos in a slide show. I put that on in my store with pictures of customers and there motorcycles. They seem to enjoy it. There are some motorcycle movies that we liked in Prime.
author: LT

review: Only had for 2 weeks- would drop a signal all of the time
author: dawn c green

review: Already had an Amazon Fire and like it.  Purchased the Fire Stick for another DumbTV (vs. SmartTV).  Installation and set-up was easy.  Reception is good.  Will consider purchasing another if/when the opportunity arises.
author: Tom B.

review: If you dont have a smart TV, this is a must have. Even if you do, this runs better than most of the smart TVs I've seen. You can also sideload android apps onto this, so the possibilities are amazing!
author: Stan

review: Great way to make a regular TV into a smart one.  Hood stuff.
author: LL

review: I love this. It has so much functionality and sleekness when compared to the chrome. Al
author: Kartheek G.

review: Love it glad I got it
author: Dan
